SELECT A.* , B.DDL_IDX_PNM , B.DDL_IDX_LNM , C.DDL_TBL_PNM , C.DDL_TBL_LNM , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM FROM WAQ_DDL_IDX_COL A INNER JOIN WAH_DDL_IDX B ON A.DDL_IDX_ID = B.DDL_IDX_ID AND A.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND A.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND A.RQST_DTL_SNO = B.RQST_DTL_SNO AND A.RQST_DCD = 'CU' INNER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL C ON B.DDL_TBL_ID = C.DDL_TBL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND A.DDL_IDX_COL_ID = #{ddlIdxColId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

AND A.DDL_IDX_ID = #{ddlIdxId}
AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U')
